participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Shy and introspective, but passionate about his interests.
participant_1.background: I have a crush on a girl from my class, but I'm too afraid to tell her. I love my family, but they can be very critical of me. I listen to a lot of strange music. While both my parents have thick European accents, I do not. I work part-time in the campus library.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Energetic and adventurous, with a strong sense of community.
participant_2.background: I'm an avid cook and weight lifter. I have two passions: challenging myself and volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop. I haven't had to work a day in my life. I love listening to chillstep while I do my yoga in the morning. I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.

content.text: I love growing plants, do you garden?
I grow the tallest sunflowers you've ever seen.
Wow, that's awesome. I grow a lot of different plants, but my favorite are my sunflowers. Do you do anything else for fun?
I'm an avid cook and weight lifter.
Nice, I'm not much of a cook, but I love to lift weights. What do you like to cook?
I love making healthy, home-cooked meals. What do you like to lift?
I mainly do compound lifts like squats, deadlifts, and bench press. I also do some cardio and calisthenics.
I do a lot of compound lifts as well, but I also do a lot of isolation exercises. I love to challenge myself, and I always try to push myself to the next level.
That's awesome. I'm the same way. I love trying new things and pushing myself to be better.
I'm glad to hear that. It's always nice to meet someone who has the same passion for fitness as I do.
Me too. It's not easy to find people who are as passionate about fitness as I am.
Well, now you've found one. I'm always looking for new people to lift with.
Awesome. I'd love to lift with you sometime.
Sounds good. We can exchange numbers and set something up.
Perfect. I'm free anytime this weekend
